mealTypeId.description: 1 – Breakfast; 2 – Morning Snack; 3 – Lunch; 4 – Afternoon Snack; 5 – Dinner; 7 – Anytime

unitId.description: Unit id; typically retrieved via a previous calls to Get Foods (Recent, Frequent, Favorite), Search Foods or Get Food Units

amount.description: Amount consumed; in the format X.XX, in a selected unit (unitId).

date.description: Log entry date; in the format yyyy-MM-dd
